name: floristically
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that relates to plants and where they grow: The majority of the studies were carried out in the relatively floristically impoverished countries of the Northern Hemisphere. Papua New Guinea is the world’s most floristically diverse island, home to about five percent of the world’s plant species.
More examplesFewer examplesThe southern uplands have floristically rich pastures and hay meadows.Floristically, the forest has more in common with the southern part of the region.These areas have become floristically impoverished in recent years.
